languages.text: "Если для победы над сомнениями тебе надо убить невинных, то ты не ткач, а обычная убийца. Бойся своей жажды крови!"

traits.locale_text: "Если для победы над сомнениями тебе надо убить невинных, то ты не ткач, а обычная убийца".

languages.text: "If you must kill innocents to vanquish your doubts, then you are not a spinner but a common murderer. You should fear the bloodlust you feel!"
languages.original_text: "Если для победы над сомнениями тебе надо убить невинных, то ты не ткач, а обычная убийца. Бойся своей жажды крови!"

traits.locale_text: "If you must kill innocents to vanquish your doubts, then you are not a spinner but a common murderer. You should fear the bloodlust you feel!"
"If you must kill innocents to vanquish your doubts, then you are not a spinner but a common murderer. You should fear the bloodlust you feel!"
"If you must kill innocents to vanquish your doubts, then you are not a spinner but a common murderer. You should fear the bloodlust you feel!"
"If you must kill innocents to vanquish your doubts, then you are not a spinner but a common murderer. You should fear the bloodlust you feel!"
"If you must kill innocents to vanquish your doubts, then you are not a spinner but a common murderer. You should fear the bloodlust you feel!"
"If you must kill innocents to vanquish your doubts, then you are not a spinner but a common murderer. You should fear the bloodlust you feel!"

languages.text: «Si tiene que matar inocentes para despejar sus dudas, entonces no es usted una tejedora, sino una vulgar asesina. ¡Debería recelar de su sed de sangre!».
languages.original_text: "If you must kill innocents to vanquish your doubts, then you are not a spinner but a common murderer. You should fear the bloodlust you feel!"

traits.locale_text: «Si tiene que matar inocentes para despejar sus dudas, entonces no es usted una tejedora, sino una vulgar asesina. ¡Debería recelar de su sed de sangre!».

languages.text: 「疑念を打ち消すために罪のない人を殺さなければならないのなら、あなたは織り手ではなく、ただの殺人者だ。したがって、血の渇きを恐れるべきだ！」
languages.original_text: "If you must kill innocents to vanquish your doubts, then you are not a spinner but a common murderer. You should fear the bloodlust you feel!"

traits.locale_text: 「疑念を打ち消すために罪のない人を殺さなければならないのなら、あなたは織り手ではなく、ただの殺人者だ。したがって、血の渇きを恐れるべきだ！」

languages.text: “如果你必须通过杀害无辜之人才能消除疑虑，那你根本就不是什么织网者，不过是随处可见的杀人犯罢了。你应该对嗜血的欲望心怀警惕！”
languages.original_text: "If you must kill innocents to vanquish your doubts, then you are not a spinner but a common murderer. You should fear the bloodlust you feel!"

traits.locale_text: “如果你必须通过杀害无辜之人才能消除疑虑，那你根本就不是什么织网者，不过是随处可见的杀人犯罢了。你应该对嗜血的欲望心怀警惕！”

languages.text: "Ihr müsst Unschuldige töten, um Eure Zweifel zu zerstreuen, denn Ihr seid keine Spinnerin, sondern eine gemeine Mörderin. Ihr solltet Euren Blutdurst fürchten."
languages.original_text: "If you must kill innocents to vanquish your doubts, then you are not a spinner but a common murderer. You should fear the bloodlust you feel!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr müsst Unschuldige töten, um Eure Zweifel zu zerstreuen, denn Ihr seid keine Spinnerin, sondern eine gemeine Mörderin. Ihr solltet Euren Blutdurst fürchten."

languages.text: « Ce ne sont pas les tisseurs qui tuent des innocents pour vaincre leurs doutes, mais les vulgaires assassins. Vous devriez craindre cette soif de sang qui vous anime ! »
languages.original_text: "If you must kill innocents to vanquish your doubts, then you are not a spinner but a common murderer. You should fear the bloodlust you feel!"

traits.locale_text: « Ce ne sont pas les tisseurs qui tuent des innocents pour vaincre leurs doutes, mais les vulgaires assassins. Vous devriez craindre cette soif de sang qui vous anime ! »

languages.text: "Kuşkularını alt etmek için masumları öldürmen gerekiyorsa o hâlde bir dokur değil, sıradan bir katilsin. Hissettiğin kana susamışlıktan korkmalısın!"
languages.original_text: "If you must kill innocents to vanquish your doubts, then you are not a spinner but a common murderer. You should fear the bloodlust you feel!"
